attributes.action: liaise with the uni - lateral bodies of WHO and the UNFPA to make the emergency services more systematic. Please encourage, as a G8 leader, all nations to have the same emergency call out number
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
911 or 999 - whatever number is decided : it should be the same to save time in emergencies and increase consistency - especially in an age when more people travel. Paramdeic care is lookingat roughly a ten minute timescale. Based on a similar Safe Motherhood model which attributes the causes of maternal mortalities to 3 delays - in seeking assistance, in accessing services and receiving appropriate care - please do all you can to enhance service provider support and give more time

a) to speed up and ease communication in crises
b) for ambulances to get to callout locations

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
